name: Bubble Wrap Simulator
description:
A Jamulator submission video game.

Based on a bubble wrap that came along with shipping package, came a wonder if I could pop more of it indefinitely.

ESC to open setting to set number of bubbles.

Alt+F4 to quit (I forgot to add quit button sorry :/ )

Want to see how it made or suggest a change? Check out GitHub: ray1997/JamulatorBubbleWrapSimulator (github.com)
